query:
UPDATE problems SET 
problemText = '7. 点 $S$ 和 $T$ 的坐标分别是 $(12, -5)$ 和 $(-3, -7)$。$S$ 绕原点 $O$ 逆时针旋转 $90°$ 到 $S'$，$T$ 关于 $x$ 轴对称到 $T'$。
(a) 写出 $S'$ 和 $T'$ 的坐标。
(b) 求 $S'T'$ 的斜率。',
problemTextEn = '7. The coordinates of the points $S$ and $T$ are $(12, -5)$ and $(-3, -7)$ respectively. $S$ is rotated anticlockwise about $O$ through $90°$ to $S'$, where $O$ is the origin. $T$ is the reflection image of $T$ with respect to the x-axis.
(a) Write down the coordinates of $S'$ and $T'$.
(b) Find the slope of $S'T'$.'
WHERE id = 30001;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user CpukH5rjPkny7dW.root --database C5wzA5LwhnXBKwVJaMeftJ --execute UPDATE problems SET 
problemText = '7. 点 $S$ 和 $T$ 的坐标分别是 $(12, -5)$ 和 $(-3, -7)$。$S$ 绕原点 $O$ 逆时针旋转 $90°$ 到 $S'$，$T$ 关于 $x$ 轴对称到 $T'$。
(a) 写出 $S'$ 和 $T'$ 的坐标。
(b) 求 $S'T'$ 的斜率。',
problemTextEn = '7. The coordinates of the points $S$ and $T$ are $(12, -5)$ and $(-3, -7)$ respectively. $S$ is rotated anticlockwise about $O$ through $90°$ to $S'$, where $O$ is the origin. $T$ is the reflection image of $T$ with respect to the x-axis.
(a) Write down the coordinates of $S'$ and $T'$.
(b) Find the slope of $S'T'$.'
WHERE id = 30001;
